items.sentence: Tom will do that whether you like it or not.
Tom was one of the best players on our team.
Tom wants to be finished doing that by 2:30.
Tom seemed convinced that he had to do that.
Tom said that wasn't the reason he did that.
Tom promised that he wouldn't drink anymore.
Tom promised me that everything would be OK.
Tom knew how important doing that was to me.
Tom doesn't care whether you do that or not.
Tom and I don't very often do that together.
Tom wondered if Mary would do that for John.
Tom told Mary that he was afraid to do that.
Tom told Mary that he thought John was well.
Tom told Mary that he thought John was rich.
Tom told Mary that he thought John was nice.
Tom told Mary that he thought John was done.
Tom told Mary that John was his best friend.
Tom told Mary that John could do that today.
Tom should tell Mary not to do that anymore.
Tom said that Mary wouldn't do that anymore.
